title: MASSIVE and CONSTANT lag spikes after patch
body: spiking to 600+ MS every 15 seconds or so.

replies.body:
Getting such high lag spikes seem to point to some sort of connection issue between your computer and the League of Legends game servers.  While I can't point to an exact root cause, I strongly recommend that you use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743).  It will analyze your past games and let you know if or where there is a connection issue as well as what you can do to help fix it.

I hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
